Literature.Title: Discovery of Ll-CATH: a novel cathelicidin from the Chong'an Moustache Toad (Leptobrachium liui) with antibacterial and immunomodulatory activity
Literature.Author: Chen J, Zhang CY, Wang Y, Zhang L, Seah RWX, Ma L, Ding GH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(no activity data),Escherichia coli K-12(no activity data),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(no activity data),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 25933(MIC=100µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Streptococcus iniae ATCC 29178(no activity data),Vibrio harveyi ATCC 33866(MIC=25µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 33847(MIC=100µg/ml),Vibrio vulnificus ATCC 279562(MIC=3.75µg/ml)
